CustomField.description:
The value in the field will be "Inside SLA" if the following conditions are true: [WC Underwriting Review Complete] is blank AND [Work Comp U/W:# of Open Discrepancies] = 0 AND NOW() is less than or equal to the [WC UW Complete Target Time]
The value in the field will be "Outside SLA" if the following conditions are true: [WC Underwriting Review Complete] is blank AND [Work Comp U/W:# of Open Discrepancies] = 0 AND NOW() is greater than the [WC UW Complete Target Time]
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK(WC_Underwriting_Review_Complete__c) && (Work_Comp_U_W_of_Open_Discrepancies__c = 0) && (NOW() <= WC_UW_Complete_Target_Time__c ), "Inside SLA",
IF( ISBLANK(WC_Underwriting_Review_Complete__c) && (Work_Comp_U_W_of_Open_Discrepancies__c = 0) && (NOW() > WC_UW_Complete_Target_Time__c ), "Outside SLA", "") )
CustomField.label: WC SLA
